A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Worst Star Wars movie of all time\, and worse\, it has destroyed Star Wars. Disney are just in it for the money and don't care about it. I will not watch any star wars movies they make. I'm a lifelong huge fan and they managed to ruin the franchise. The story makes no sense\, the whole movie is just lazy. It's so bad I no longer care about the new characters Abrams so carefully set up. Anyone who cares about what Star Wars was originally about will be insulted and disgusted with this whole pointless thing that can't even be called a movie. Disney killed Star Wars and a part of me died with it. Goodbye Disney.
